idea-plugin.name: Java Code Helper
idea-plugin.description:
For learning plug-in development。Exchange ideas 、 Feed back BUG 、 Raise requirements ：gitee

  • Code intelligent completion
    1.In the construction method, the one key completion field is assigned according to the parameters
    2.In non construction methods, one click to create new objects according to the return type
    3.In non construction methods, the method of finding variables with the same name
  • Fast Jump
    Support fast jump between feign and controller. Click the jump icon to jump
  • Generate code according to the table creating SQL
    It is recommended to use a custom template. The generated code is more consistent with your project. Template Rules：gitee
    The default template can generate model, vo, service, serviceImpl, mapper, and controller
  • One click translation
    Currently, only Baidu Translation is supported. You can apply for Baidu Translation Platform Account and translate 1 million characters for free every month
    After configuring the account in the idea, select the text to be translated, right-click and select Translate

很蛋疼，官方要求必须英文开始

用于学习插件开发。交流想法、反馈BUG、提需求 ：gitee

  • 代码智能补全
    1.构造方法内，根据参数，一键补全字段赋值
    2.非构造方法内，根据返回类型，一键新建对象
    3.非构造方法内，寻找变量的同名方法
  • 快捷跳转
    支持feign与controller的快捷跳转，点击跳转图标，一键跳转
  • 根据建表SQL生成代码
    建议使用自定义模板，生成的代码更符合自己的项目，模板规则：gitee
    默认模板可生成model、vo、service、serviceImpl、mapper、controller
  • 一键翻译
    目前仅支持百度翻译，可自行申请百度翻译平台账号，每月可免费翻译100万字符
    在idea中配置账号后，选中待翻译文本，右击选择Translate即可
